Title: Relates to the development of uniform standards for the coloring of wind turbine rotor blades
Summary: Relates to the development of uniform standards for the coloring of wind turbine rotor blades, to avoid or minimize, to the maximum extent practicable, any bird collisions arising from the siting, design, construction and operation of a major renewable energy facility utilizing wind turbines.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to the development of uniform standards for the coloring of wind turbine rotor blades
